name: >> Get VirusTotal Reputation for Domain
description: Input is Domain, Output is HTML reputation details and HTML score and Integer score

arguments.vt_html:
VirusTotal Threat Intel

{{vars.vt_summary_report}} {%for section in vars.list_of_lists%}
{{section.0}}

{{section.1 | json2html(row_fields=[], template="Stylized with row selection", display="Vertical", styling=false, table_style={'th':'background-color:{{vars.table_color}} !important;'})}}

{%endfor%}
arguments.vt_score_html:
Title of the document {{vars.vt_score}}
VirusTotal

arguments.vt_summary_report:
Title of the document {{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}/{{vars.last_analysis_stats.values() | list | sum}}
Malicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}
Suspicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.suspicious}}
Harmless
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.harmless}}
Community Votes
Harmless {{vars.community_votes.harmless}}
Malicious {{vars.community_votes.malicious}}

arguments.name: VirusTotal

routes.name: Start -> Get URL Reputation from VT
Get URL Reputation from VT -> Is in DB
